Name: Apple Buck
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring ginger ale.
Garnish with apple wedge on rim.
Review: A refreshing long number with a taste reminiscent of cider.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2004 by Wayne Collins.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Buck contains 170 calories
